example[0]: Make sure you wrap up warm – it’s freezing.
example[1]: She was wrapped up in a thick winter coat.
definition[1]: to finish a job, meeting etc
example[2]: We’re hoping to wrap up the negotiations this week.
definition[2]: to give so much of your attention to something that you do not have time for anything else
definition[3]: a short report that repeats the main points, for example of a news broadcast
